select '设备' as 'devName', MAX(CASE WHEN ( devName='3#离心式鼓风机' and SC_CONTENT='电机及风机各紧固螺栓是否有松动' ) THEN tempResult end ) as 'a1', MAX(CASE WHEN ( devName='3#离心式鼓风机' and SC_CONTENT='运行是否有异响') THEN tempResult end ) as 'a2', MAX(CASE WHEN ( devName='3#离心式鼓风机' and SC_CONTENT='进出口阀门是否能正常开启' ) THEN tempResult end ) as 'a3', MAX(CASE WHEN ( devName='3#离心式鼓风机' and SC_CONTENT='机体、管路是否漏气' ) THEN tempResult end ) as 'a4', MAX(CASE WHEN ( devName='3#离心式鼓风机' and SC_CONTENT='轴向窜动是否在标准范围内' ) THEN tempResult end ) as 'a5', MAX(CASE WHEN ( devName='3#离心式鼓风机稀油站' and SC_CONTENT LIKE '供回油管%') THEN tempResult end ) as 'a6', MAX(CASE WHEN ( devName='3#离心式鼓风机稀油站' and SC_CONTENT LIKE '油箱油位%' ) THEN tempResult end ) as 'a7', MAX(CASE WHEN ( devName='3#离心式鼓风机稀油站' and SC_CONTENT like '油箱内%' ) THEN tempResult end ) as 'a8', MAX(CASE WHEN ( devName='3#离心式鼓风机稀油站' and SC_CONTENT like '油泵运转%' ) THEN tempResult end ) as 'a9', MAX(CASE WHEN ( devName='3#离心式鼓风机稀油站' and SC_CONTENT like '油泵压力%') THEN tempResult end ) as 'a10', MAX(CASE WHEN ( devName='3#离心式鼓风机稀油站' and SC_CONTENT LIKE '供油压力%' ) THEN tempResult end ) as 'a11', MAX(CASE WHEN ( devName='3#离心式鼓风机稀油站' and SC_CONTENT='油站供油温度' ) THEN RESULT end ) as 'a12', MAX(CASE WHEN ( devName='3#离心式鼓风机稀油站' and SC_CONTENT='油站油箱温度' ) THEN RESULT end ) as 'a13', MAX(CASE WHEN ( devName='3#离心式鼓风机稀油站' and SC_CONTENT LIKE '冷却器%' ) THEN tempResult end ) as 'a14', MAX(CASE WHEN ( devName='3#离心式鼓风机稀油站' and SC_CONTENT like '回油滤网%' ) THEN tempResult end ) as 'a15'
FROM ( SELECT SC_PART,devName,SC_CONTENT,RESULT, (CASE WHEN RESULT='停机不检' THEN RESULT WHEN RESULT='手工已检' THEN REMARK WHEN ((SC_CONTENT!='油站供油温度') AND (ALTPID = 2 OR ALTPID=1) ) THEN '故障' WHEN ((SC_CONTENT!='油站油箱温度') AND (ALTPID = 0)) THEN '正常' ELSE RESULT END ) as tempResult FROM dxj_spot_result WHERE DEPT_NAME='磨浮设备' AND ( devName='3#离心式鼓风机' OR devName='3#离心式鼓风机稀油站' ) AND
date(uploadResultTime) >= DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 14 DAY) -- to_days(TASKSTART_TM) = to_days(now())-- 当天数据 )as temp

select '电仪' as 'devName', MAX(CASE WHEN ( devName='3#鼓风机电机' and SC_PART='本体' ) THEN tempResult end ) as 'a1', MAX(CASE WHEN ( devName='3#鼓风机电机' and SC_PART='各紧固螺栓') THEN tempResult end ) as 'a2', MAX(CASE WHEN ( devName='3#鼓风机电机' and SC_CONTENT='测振' ) THEN RESULT end ) as 'a3', MAX(CASE WHEN ( devName='3#鼓风机电机' and SC_CONTENT='测温' ) THEN RESULT end ) as 'a4', MAX(CASE WHEN ( devName='3#鼓风机1#稀油站电机' and SC_PART='本体' ) THEN tempResult end ) as 'a5', MAX(CASE WHEN ( devName='3#鼓风机1#稀油站电机' and SC_PART='各紧固螺栓') THEN tempResult end ) as 'a6', MAX(CASE WHEN ( devName='3#鼓风机1#稀油站电机' and SC_CONTENT='测振' ) THEN RESULT end ) as 'a7', MAX(CASE WHEN ( devName='3#鼓风机1#稀油站电机' and SC_CONTENT='测温' ) THEN RESULT end ) as 'a8', MAX(CASE WHEN ( devName='3#鼓风机2#稀油站电机' and SC_PART='本体' ) THEN tempResult end ) as 'a9', MAX(CASE WHEN ( devName='3#鼓风机2#稀油站电机' and SC_PART='各紧固螺栓') THEN tempResult end ) as 'a10', MAX(CASE WHEN ( devName='3#鼓风机2#稀油站电机' and SC_CONTENT='测振' ) THEN RESULT end ) as 'a11', MAX(CASE WHEN ( devName='3#鼓风机2#稀油站电机' and SC_CONTENT='测温' ) THEN RESULT end ) as 'a12' FROM ( SELECT SC_PART,devName,SC_CONTENT,RESULT, (CASE WHEN RESULT='停机不检' THEN RESULT WHEN ((SC_PART!='振动') AND (ALTPID = 2 OR ALTPID=1) ) THEN '故障' WHEN ((SC_PART!='振动') AND (ALTPID = 0)) THEN '正常' ELSE RESULT END ) as tempResult FROM dxj_spot_result WHERE DEPT_NAME='电仪工段' AND ( devName='3#鼓风机电机' OR devName='3#鼓风机1#稀油站电机' OR devName='3#鼓风机2#稀油站电机' ) AND
to_days(TASKSTART_TM) = to_days(now())-- 当天数据 )as temp
